Html:
I get this inner exception when I make changes on the graph, here is the stack trace: 

at System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2.get_Item(TKey key)   

at QuickGraph.BidirectionalGraph`2.ContainsEdge(TEdge edge) 

at GraphSharp.Controls.GraphLayout`3.HighlightTriggerEventHandler(Object sender, HighlightTriggeredEventArgs args)

How can I get passed this problem?

I had this message when i tried to remove a not existing vertex or edge in my graph.

When did this message appear?
I get this message a while after removing the existing graph and displaying the new graph, not while removing... any idea?

I solved it, all i had to do is:

graphLayout.Children.Clear();

before I do changes on the graph
